item.title: The Two Questions I Wish We’d Stop Asking in 2026
item.description: How did we get here? I don’t want to know.

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Has Ended. What Happened in the Series Finale?
item.description: There was a lot to tie up after five seasons and nearly 10 years, and the show gave itself another two hours to do it. Here are the major events.

item.title: Repeat Moviegoers Help Hollywood Eke Out a Slightly Better 2025
item.description: Ticket sales in North America totaled $8.9 billion for the year, up 2 percent from 2024. But the box office remains far below prepandemic levels.
